glsa.title: Net-SNMP: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Net-SNMP could lead to a Denial of Service.

background.p: Net-SNMP is a collection of tools for generating and retrieving SNMP data.

description.p: Oscar Mira-Sanchez reported an integer overflow in the netsnmp_create_subtree_cache() function in agent/snmp_agent.c when processing GETBULK requests.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to crash the SNMP server. NOTE: The attacker needs to know the community string to exploit this vulnerability.

workaround.p: Restrict access to trusted entities only.
